properties.body:
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
SAINT VINCENT TO SAINT LUCIA.
DNC 14.
29 FOOT F/V PEGASUS, GREEN HULL, THREE PERSONS
ON BOARD, OVERDUE SAINT VINCENT (13-15N 061-12W)
TO SAINT LUCIA (13-53N 060-59W).
LAST KNOWN POSITION 13-15N 061-12W AT 31 JAN.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
INMARSAT-C: 422799024,
TELEX: 42912008,
PHONE: 5965 9670 9292,
FAX: 5965 9663 2450,
E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
